pr_title: Add method to write a unique subset

timeline.message:
Add method to write a unique subset

Signed-off-by: Mathieu BAGUE <mathieu.bague@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText: Not sure it is used anywhere else but it may be safer to add a default implementation
timeline.author: MioRtia
MioRtia
timeline.diffHunk:

      */

+    /**
+     * Write the contents of a context in the given data source.

+     * @param contextName the context to write
+     */
+    void write(DataSource ds, String contextName);

timeline.message:
Add a default behaviour for new methods
